page.title: 12 SOUTH-AYR ALLOWAY SCHOOL
page.content: For our school of{450}pupils, aged from{5}to{12}years, there are{17 teachers, but only{2}of these are men, plus auxiliary staff. We attend school from{Monday}to {Friday 9.00am.}until{3.20pm.}and have lessons for{5 hours}each day. The curriculum includes{Mathematics_ without calculators,{Language Arts, {Environmental Studies, Art, Music, {Physical Education}and{Religious {Education.}In addition, individual musical tuition is available on piano, strings, woodwind or brass instruments. For 1 or 2 subjects a week we watch television or listen to the radio. The school uses a video recorder and three recently acquired computers. Activities such as football, hockey and netball are provided after school.
